div.div:
feat: Home Screen - Loading Indicators and Data Syncing
This commit enhances the Home screen with loading indicators and data syncing improvements.
- **Loading Indicators:** - Added a `CircularProgressIndicator` to visually represent when data is being synced. - Displays a "Coming Soon..." message when the sync is complete but no data is available.
- **Data Syncing:** - Moved the `syncActivityData` call to the `init` block to trigger syncing on ViewModel initialization. - Added a call to `getActivityGraphItems` after successful data syncing to update the UI with the latest data. - The activity graph items are now fetched after the data is synced, ensuring the UI reflects the most current information.

feat: ActivityGraph animation easing
This commit updates the easing function for animations in the `ActivityGraph` composable.
- The easing function for `animatedBgColor` and `animateTextColor` has been changed from `FastOutSlowInEasing` to `FastOutLinearInEasing`.

feat: Enhance home screen with activity graph and data sync improvements
This commit enhances the home screen by adding an activity graph and improves data synchronization.
- **Activity Graph:** - Implemented an `ActivityGraph` composable to display user activity data visually. - Added `ActivityGraphItem` data class to represent activity data for the graph. - Created `GetActivityGraphItemsUseCase` to fetch activity graph data from the repository. - Integrated the graph into the home screen, showing a placeholder initially and updating with fetched data.
- **Data Synchronization:** - Increased the daily activity sync time limit to 30 minutes to reduce frequent syncing. - Added logic to sync activity data on the home screen and display a loading state during the process.
- **UI Improvements:** - Adjusted padding and styling of the top bar for better visual appeal. - Added custom font support for specific text elements. - Implemented color utilities for activity-related visual elements.
- **Dependencies:** - Updated Kotlin version to 2.1.20-RC2. - Updated Ktor version to 3.1.2. - Updated Kermit version to 2.0.5. - Updated androidx.room version to 2.7.0-rc03. - Updated sqlite version to 2.5.0-rc03. - Added kotlinx-collections-immutable dependency with version 0.3.8.
- **Code Refactoring:** - Added a `LocalDateTimeConverter` for Room database to handle `LocalDate` conversions. - Created `ActivityGraphItemResult` to map database results to `ActivityGraphItem`. - Introduced `CustomCalendarHelper` to generate date ranges for the activity graph.
feat: custom calendar util improvements and test changes

feat: compose hot reload
for jvm target and i am not using anything on jvm as of now

feat: Add CustomCalendarHelper for date range generation
This commit introduces `CustomCalendarHelper`, a utility object for generating date ranges, specifically for calculating week ranges.
- **`CustomCalendarHelper`:** - Provides functions to generate a list of weeks, each containing a list of `LocalDate` objects. - `generateDateRange`: Generates a date range of specified weeks (defaulting to 4) based on a start date. - `generateWeek`: Generates a list of dates for a week starting from a given Monday. - `getMondayOfWeek`: Determines the Monday of the week for a given date. - `formatWeek`: Formats a week's dates into a string. - **Unit Tests:** - Added `CustomCalendarHelperTest` with a test case to verify the correct generation of a 4-week date range. - Validates the number of weeks, days per week, chronological order, and date consistency between weeks. - Includes checks against specific known dates to ensure accuracy.

feat: Enhance data syncing and time management
This commit introduces enhancements to data syncing and time management within the application.
- **Data Syncing Improvements:** - Implemented a mechanism to prevent frequent data syncing by checking the last sync time. Data will only sync if the last sync was more than 10 minutes ago. - Modified the app's initial data sync to fetch a month's worth of data instead of a week.
- **Time Management:** - Added a utility function `isTimeWithinLimit` in `DateTimeUtil` to check if a given timestamp is within a specified duration limit.

feat: sync, datetime uti
hard to track all the changes as its not complete

feat: Update dependencies and add debug suffix
This commit updates several dependencies in the project and introduces a debug application ID suffix.
- **Dependencies Updated:** - Kotlin: 2.1.10 -> 2.1.20 - KSP: 2.1.0-1.0.29 -> 2.1.20-1.0.32 - androidx.room: 2.7.0-rc02 -> 2.7.0-rc03 - **Compose App:** - Added a debug application ID suffix ".debug" for the debug build type.

feat: Refactor NetworkBoundResource for Enhanced Data Handling
This commit refactors the `NetworkBoundResource` class to improve data handling and type safety.
- **Generic Type Parameters:** - Updated the class to use generic type parameters `DbResult`, `DtoResult`, and `ResultType` for better type safety and clarity. - **Data Processing:** - Added `processDbResponse` to handle database results. - Ensures consistent processing of data from both network and database sources. - **Error Handling:** - Improved error handling by including cached data in error states. - Handles cases where no data is available more effectively. - **Simplified Logic:** - Refactored the logic for loading data and handling network requests. - Simplified the flow for fetching and saving data.

feat: Enhance HTTP client logging and add date formatting utilities
This commit introduces several enhancements, including improved HTTP client logging and new date formatting utilities.
- **HTTP Client Logging:** - Updated the HTTP client to log both requests and responses, including headers and body content. - The logging output is now more structured and readable.
- **Date Formatting Utilities:** - Added `DateFormatType` enum to specify different date formats (ISO, LOCAL_DATE_TIME, DATE_ONLY). - Implemented functions to convert between date strings and Unix timestamps with format type specification. - Added `unixTimestampToString` to convert Unix timestamps to formatted date strings based on the specified format. - The existing date conversion functions are updated to use new formatting utilities.
- **Base DAO:** - Added `@Dao` annotation to the `BaseDao` interface.
- **Base Mapper:** - Created `BaseMapper.kt` with interfaces for DTO, entity, and domain model mapping.
- **Safe Try:** - Introduced `wacSafeTry` for safe execution of blocks returning `Result<T, WacproError>`.

feat: Implement offline support and improve activity management (test changes)
everything will be cleaned up later

feat: Add logger in BaseViewModel
This commit introduces a logger in `BaseViewModel`
- **BaseViewModel:** - Added a `logger` property to `BaseViewModel` for logging. - The logger is initialized with the name of the class using it.
added HikariCP for database connection pooling.
improve: api body parsing error response
